name: Spooky Cryptid Dating
description:
A game made as part of the Emerson & Northeastern Halloween Game Jam. A visual novel made in Ren'Py, you must navigate life as a new kid in town when all your friends (and love interests) are cryptids. The game is currently incomplete, but we have discussed updating it in the near future!

Liam Cristello - Programming
ThanksMaddy - Background Art
Gemhunter178 - Background Art
Remi Chandler - Music
Birbstille - Character Art
Jade Edwards - Writing
Samuel Wardwell - Writing
Christopher Heins - Sound Effects
